snippet: Mental health professionals, law enforcement agencies and schools collaborate in one of the nation’s most intensive efforts to identify potential perpetrators of violent crimes.
abstract: School Threat Assessment Response Team program in Los Angeles is one of most intensive efforts in nation to identify potential for school violence and take steps to prevent it; program is unusual collaboration of county mental health professionals, law enforcement agencies and schools.
lead_paragraph: Mental health professionals, law enforcement agencies and schools collaborate in one of the nation’s most intensive efforts to identify potential perpetrators of violent crimes.

headline.seo: In Los Angeles, Focusing on Violence Before It Occurs
headline.main: Focusing on Violence Before It Happens
headline.print_headline: Focusing on Violence Before It Happens
